name: This is REAL (Doctor_Vov)
description:
This game is absolutely unrealistically arrogant.

And now she has imprisoned your soul in silly flammable dummies! Save them and yourself by providing them with food, medicine and shelter! Make them the chosen ones and free yourself from the oppression of the Game!

Every human produces thoughts.

A person can die from lack of food, happiness or hp.

For thoughts you need to buy:

Bonfire - you can warm yourself near it

Berries - give food

Tents - you can sleep in them

Spiders - if you kill them, they give food

First aid kit - replenishes health

You need to create 5 favorites to beat the game.
